description: Inaugural tender notice inviting interested suppliers to submit proposals for a multi-year contract to provide ruggedized travel backpacks with foam inserts for the transport of IM/IT equipment for CAF deployed networks.
full_summary:
.TOPIC:
Ruggedized Travel Backpacks with Foam Inserts for the Canadian Armed Forces (CAF) Deployable Networks

---

**Background**
The Department of National Defence (DND) announces the solicitation for a multi-year contract to provide ruggedized travel backpacks with foam inserts for the Canadian Armed Forces (CAF) Deployable Networks.

**Scope of the contract**
The contract includes the provision of the initial deliverables and optional deliverables until March 31, 2025. The estimated quantities of the required items are as follows:

| Category | Quantity |
| --- | --- |
| Ruggedized Travel Backpacks  | 602 |
| Foam Insert Type 1  | 603 |
| Foam Insert Type 2  | 604 |
| Foam Insert Type 3  | 6040 |

**Key Requirements**
The ruggedized travel backpacks must be designed to securely transport Information Management/ Information Technology (IM/IT) equipment deployed aboard both military and commercial vessels, under canvas and in hotel environments. The systems must be compliant with commercial aviation standards for checked baggage.

**Tender Process**
A bid must comply with the requirements of the bid solicitation and meet all mandatory technical evaluation criteria to be declared responsive. The responsive bid with the lowest evaluated price will be recommended for award of a contract.

**Important Dates**
Tender closing date: January 9, 2023, at 14:00 ET
Delivery date: March 31, 2023

**Contact Information**
Brooke Monette
brooke.monette@forces.gc.ca

---

**Document Availability**
The solicitation package can be accessed on the Global Public Goods site: 

https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/12/01/a92f55b205b6c381fc6242a13170badd/rfp_w8474-238300_b_eng.pdf (English)
https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/12/01/04178aa311561eb0605d1749efba79a7/rfp_w8474-238300_b_fre.pdf (French)
